title: Number of downloaded messages.
creator: jamie872
content: I needed to go back and look for some messages from August 27th it is now September 16th. These messages are not in my readily available inbox. I can find them doing a deeper search. I can star these messages I can mark these messages as unread, but somehow they still don't show up at the top of my email box, it's like they're too old or I have too many other emails. I cannot find a setting for this like number of days to keep or the amount of GB storage of mail to keep on the phone.

title: The "To" adress is wrong
creator: DanOpcode
content: Take a look at this screenshot. This email sent to me has the same "To" address as "From" address, and it isn't my address, it is the sender's. It feels like a bug? I expect to see my email address under "To". This normally works, but not with this particular email.

title: cannot read content of folder in v12 and v13B1
creator: klaus79
content:
Since v 12.n I cannot read content of folders originally created on my domains byThunderbird on my Linux laptop. The situation is the same for k9mail.

I need some advice to be able to read in mails stored in folders.
